about_the_game: Become a Blood Knight, use the blood of slain foes to fuel your unholy sorcery. Gather followers  and take the heads of the monsters plaguing a desperate town. Blood Soaked Bastard! is a jrpg style game, it's art style is heavily influenced by  medieval dark fantasy. Speak to characters scattered about, find followers, and fight various enemies, including bosses and mini bosses in turn based rpg combat to level up your party. As the main character, Bastard! deals damage in combat, a blood meter will build which can be expended to use special "Blood Magic" attacks with a versatile range of effects. The game is about one or two hours in length and has two sperate endings influenced by your interactions with the characters within. Included with purchase is just a copy of Blood Soaked Bastard! and no additional content. This game is a side project while in college and a first crack at game making, please enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: General apathy towards violence and murder, cutscenes depict blood, and what could be considered upsetting circumstances of death.  some non human characters are depicted in full nudity. Elusion to sexual violence / rape. Depicts suicide. Depicts slavery.
